resources.string: The DPM App is a Prototype version of a degree planner only and NOT an official study plan. It is intended that students shall use this to get an understanding of the pathways offered and then discuss study plans with a Wintec representative. Pathways may change accordingly making older versions redundant â€“ Wintec takes no responsibility of outdated pathways or information displayed on the app.
Degree Programe Mapper was developed for Wintec, by Catdog54.
Michael Aldous, Hayden Ferries, Corban Whiteman, David Taylor, Showan Simkhada.

Press down on a module for a couple seconds to alternate between "passed" and "active". 
 White indicates active. 
 Green indicates passed. 
 Red indicates prerequisites not met.
